src:
VIDEO: Đuro objavil posnetek, ob katerem vedno joka
Oglasila se je tudi njegova hči Zala.
05 Nov 2019, 07:12 by T. V.
Branko Đurić - Đuro, mož slovenske pevke in igralke Tanje Ribič, velja za enega najbolj zabavnih zvezdnikov na območju nekdanje Jugoslavije. Zdaj pa je objavil nekaj, kar njega spravlja v smeh.»Ne vem, ali je še komu to smešno, ampak jaz jokam vsakič, ko ga gledam,« je zapisal ob posnetku, na katerem želi starejši par jahati kamelo, a ta nikakor noče sodelovati. Da se zdi posnetek zabaven tudi drugim, dokazujejo komentarji pod objavo, oglasila pa se je tudi njegova hči Zala in prav tako razkrila, da jo je objava njenega očeta nasmejala.
text:
VIDEO: Djuro posted a clip that he always cries for
His daughter Zala also showed up.
05 Nov 2019, 07:12 by T.V.
Branko Djuric - Djuro, husband of Slovenian singer and actress Tanja Ribic, is considered one of the most entertaining celebrities in the former Yugoslavia. But now he has posted something that makes him laugh. "I don't know if it's funny to anyone, but I cry every time I watch it," he wrote at the clip where the older couple wants to ride a camel, but this one does not want to to participate. Commenting on the announcement also proved that the recording was fun to others, and his daughter Zala also commented and revealed that her father's announcement made her laugh.
